projects.name: Workintech
projects.text: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

projects.name: Journey
projects.text: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

projects.name: Pizza
projects.text: A pizza order website which users can easily create orders. Built with JS, CSS and React. It aims to provide a good user experience with its simple and functional design.
